Benchmarks

Johan Larsson

2019-02-22

benchmarks.Rmd

Benchmarks

In this vignette, we will provide a matrix of benchmarks for the solvers, penalties, and GLM families in golem.

First, we setup a function to plot the results from the fit.

library(golem)
library(lattice)

set.seed(1)

plot_optim <- function(fit) {
  d <- attr(fit, "diagnostics")
  y <- d$loss
  
  rel_change <- diff(y)/y[-length(y)]
  
  trunc_ind <- which(abs(rel_change) < 1e-5)[1]
  
  trunc_ind <- ifelse(is.na(trunc_ind), length(y), trunc_ind)
  
  Suboptimality <- y[1:trunc_ind] - min(y)
  Time <- d$time[1:trunc_ind]

  xyplot(Suboptimality ~ Time, type = "l",
         xlab = "Time (seconds)")
}

Gaussian model

x <- as.matrix(abalone$x)
y <- abalone$y

fit <- golem(x, y, family = "gaussian",
             solver = fista,
             diagnostics = TRUE)
d <- attr(fit, "diagnostics")
plot_optim(fit)

Objective loss over time for the abalone data set (Gaussian response).

Binomial model

x <- as.matrix(heart$x)
#> Loading required package: Matrix
y <- heart$y

fit <- golem(x, y, family = "binomial",
             solver = fista,
             diagnostics = TRUE)

plot_optim(fit)

Objective loss over time for the heart data set (binomial response).
